content.p: If you have questions or comments about Carrot2, please contact us through the Carrot2-developers mailing list (subscription is required). For past messages circulated to the mailing list, please see the archive.

If you would like to file a bug or a feature request, please use the Carrot2 bug tracker powered by Atlassian JIRA. Finally, if you need consultancy services in the area of document clustering, text mining and the Carrot2 framework, please contact the Carrot2 spin-off company.
